item.description:
Hi incubators,

This week we are continuing our exploration of improv and the greater boston area. This week on special day I invite you all across the river to smile, relax, and of course improvise right down Massachusetts Ave. In Boston. We will be meeting at 250 Massachusetts AVe, Boston, which is the nice grass area outside the reflecting pool right across the street from Symphony Hall.

Let's enjoy this gorgeous weather together.

As always no previosnimprov expeience required, so just drop by with a smile and feel free to invite your friends. And by invite I mean drag them kicking and screaming because they will be walking away kicking and laughing.

Any questions, send me a message and let me know what's up.

Cheers!

Jason J.
item.name: Wild & Wacky...It's the wonderous Wednesday incubator, outdoors included.
